Landing.tagline: An AI platform for image validation and deepfake detection with high accuracy
Landing.aboutUsContent: I-Dentity is a next-generation image validation system. We use advanced machine learning techniques to analyze photos and determine their authenticity. Our model is trained on a large number of deepfakes and real images, achieving over 98% accuracy.

Features.accuracyDetail: The model achieves over 98% accuracy in deepfake detection
Features.instantCheckDetail: You get results almost instantly — within seconds
Features.intellegentAnalysisDetail: You receive the likelihood of forgery in percent — to understand how suspicious the image is
Features.crossPlatformDetail: Easy to use on both desktop and mobile — no matter where you are

Result.errorMessage: An error occurred during image analysis :(
Result.noFaceDetected: No face detected in the image
Result.couldBeDeepfake: The image might be a deepfake
Result.aboutDeepfake: *A deepfake is a realistic fake of a photo, video, or audio created by artificial intelligence. The technology allows replacing a person’s face, voice, or movements, making fake content nearly indistinguishable from the real thing.

Auth.emailIsTaken: This email has already been used to register
